span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vi. 跳起，跳跃： to propel oneself upward or forward into the air
【例】 The horse vaulted over the obstacle with ease. 骏马轻松地跃过障碍物。
【近】 bound, hop, jump, leap, spring

【考法 2】 vi. 一跃而至： to accomplish something as if by leaping suddenly or vigorously
【例】 She vaulted into a position of wealth. 她一夜暴富。

【记】 音：握，卧 + 跳 弯着跳过拱顶；valued 值钱的东西都放到vault里；wall + 凸，凸出来的墙
